title: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: A timeless recipe for soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies that everyone will love.

title: Creamy Carbonara Pasta
description: An authentic Italian carbonara with perfectly silky sauce, crispy guanciale, and freshly cracked pepper.

title: Mediterranean Salad
description: A vibrant and refreshing salad with tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and a zesty lemon dressing.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Rich and aromatic chicken tikka masala with tender marinated chicken in a creamy tomato-spiced sauce.

title: Street-Style Tacos
description: Authentic Mexican street tacos with seasoned meat, fresh salsa, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime.

title: Chocolate Ganache Layer Cake
description: An indulgent layered chocolate cake with rich ganache drip and fresh berry topping.
